mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_ID, REPORTED_ID, PRO_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CATE_NAME AS REPORT_CATE_NO, REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT R JOIN CATEGORY C ON R.REPORT_CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO) A ORDER BY REPORT_STATUS DESC, RNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_ID, REPORTED_ID, PRO_NO, REPORT_CATE_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, REPORT_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_RENO.NEXTVAL, #{reportId}, #{reportedId}, #{proNo}, #{reportCateNo}, #{reportContent}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
